timeline.message: Add crashing compiler plugin test case
Append to internal-log when plugin crashes

timeline.bodyText:
Is there a way to identify a plugin (a name perhaps)?
If so, can we print?
compiler plugin crashed: xyz plugin
timeline.author: irshadnilam

replies.bodyText:
I'm afraid compiler plugins at the moment doesn't have anything like that.
The only way to see which plugin failed it to check the ballerina-internal-log.
We can parse the stack trace to detect which compiler plugin crashed. I think we can do something like that.
